Articles.Content:
1stly, huge kudos to inigma for the ASC series. I've enjoyed it immensely, but I've decided I'd like to run my own series if there's enough interest.

I'm seeing if there's enough support for Yet Another Air Combat Challenge. Hence the name  Please give me your feedback and if you'd be interested in participating. If we get 10 people to commit I'll start it up.

The main idea is to have Kerbal-istic air-air combat, that is, realistic within the Kerbal universe. We are not trying to emulate "real" or "historic" combat in any way. So, no physics changing mods like FAR, and no "unrealistic" clipping/offsetting of parts. But, totally off-the-wall, rocket powered space planes bristling with lasers, missiles, and cannons are totally allowed. Also, this is not a "check out my cool looking craft" competition. This is all about maximum performance and lethality.

1st pass at "the rules".

  • Self-hosted with arbiter (myself or other officials) to settle any disputes and re-run anything as necessary. I'll parse the results and keep the leaderboard updated
  • Contestants run their own matches and post youtube videos for proof. Sorry, if you can't capture video and post it to youtube you can't play
  • 1v1
  • Best 3 of 5 rounds (all 5 rounds will be recorded for fun)
  • Kerbal'd entries only
  • Classes will be:
    • 5 tons fixed guns only (dogfight challenge)
    • 10 tons (Light Fighter)
    • 20 tons (Heavy Fighter)
  • No unrealistic clipping. No wings inside of wings, turrets/guns inside of each other, or other parts, etc...
  • craft file editing only within defaults
  • Maybe a fixed guns only cat? Good for developing dogfighting
  • Might ban or have separate cat for energy weapons, depends how exploity it gets
  • Competition start distance will be 12k
  • 100ish parts, 200 hard limit.
  • probably more stuff I'm not thinking about

This will be run in 1.1 with the following mods (subject to change). Link to all required mods. Working on my PC in 1.1!

  • BahamutoD's BDArmory
  • BahamutoD's BDAVesselSwitcher
  • BahamutoD's CameraTools
  • BDynamics Mk22 Cockpits
  • BahamutoD's DestructionEffects
  • BahamutoD's Vessel Mover
  • HyperEdit (When updated)
  • BahamutoD's Adjustable Landing Gear (if updated)
  • Scatterer (optional if system performance allows)
  • EVE (optional if system performance allows)
